:allowClear.description: Whether or not to display a clear button

bordered.description: Whether there is a border or not

:cellRender.description: Customize the contents of the cell
:cellRender.type: (current: number, info: { originNode: React.ReactNode, today: dayjs, range?: 'start' / 'end', subType: 'hour' / 'minute' / 'second' / 'meridiem' }) => React.ReactNode

changeOnBlur.description: Trigger a 'change' event when you lose focus, e.g. no longer need to click the confirm button at datetime
changeOnBlur.description_zh: 失去焦点时触发 `change` 事件，例如 datetime 下不再需要点击确认按钮

changeOnScroll.description: Change the selected value when scrolling

className.description: The name of the selector class

clearText.description: Clear the tooltip copy for the button

format.description: The time format of the presentation

:getPopupContainer.description: The container that defines the floating layer, defaults to a new div on the body
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 定义浮层的容器，默认为 body 上新建 div

hideDisabledOptions.description: Hide the option to prohibit selection

inputReadOnly.description: Make input boxes read-only (avoid opening the virtual keyboard on mobile devices)
inputReadOnly.description_zh: 设置输入框为只读（避免在移动设备上打开虚拟键盘）

needConfirm.description: Whether a confirmation button is required, when false, losing focus means selection
needConfirm.description_zh: 是否需要确认按钮，为 false 时失去焦点即代表选择

:placeholder.description: What is displayed when there is no value
:placeholder.description_zh: 没有值的时候显示的内容

placement.description: Select where the box pops up

popupClassName.description: The layer class name pops up

:popupStyle.description: Pop up a layer style object

:renderExtraFooter.description: The bottom of the selection box displays the customized content
:renderExtraFooter.description_zh: 选择框底部显示自定义的内容

showNow.description: Whether the panel displays the "Now" button
showNow.description_zh: 面板是否显示"此刻"按钮

size.description: The size of the input box, 'large' is 40px in height and 'small' is 24px, default is 32px
size.description_zh: 输入框大小，`large` 高度为 40px，`small` 为 24px，默认是 32px

:suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框后缀图标

use12Hours.description: Using the 12-hour format, 'format' defaults to 'h:mm:ss a' when true
use12Hours.description_zh: 使用 12 小时制，为 true 时 `format` 默认为 `h:mm:ss a`

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

events.name: onCalendarChange
events.description: Callback when the date to be selected changes. The 'info' parameter was added in 4.4.0
events.params: function(dates: [dayjs, dayjs], dateStrings: [string, string], info: { range: 'start' / 'end' })
events.description_zh: 待选日期发生变化的回调。info 参数自 4.4.0 添加

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: Callback when the panel is opened/closed
events.description_zh: 面板打开/关闭时的回调

DisabledTime.description: Function to disable specific time options
DisabledTime.description_zh: 用于禁用特定时间选项的函数
DisabledTime.type: (now: Dayjs) => { disabledHours?: () => number[]; disabledMinutes?: (selectedHour: number) => number[]; disabledSeconds?: (selectedHour: number, selectedMinute: number) => number[]; disabledMilliseconds?: (selectedHour: number, selectedMinute: number, selectedSecond: number) => number[]; }
